entry.title: WIND WARNING, Sechelt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:55 a.m. PDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections late this morning and this afternoon. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 this evening then light late this evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023
